Senior Frontend Developer

Senior Frontend Developer

TechCorp Solutions

Los Angeles, CA

Posted 2 days ago

$120,000 - $160,000/year

About This Role

We are seeking an experienced Senior Frontend Developer to join our dynamic team. You will be responsible for building and maintaining high-quality web applications using modern technologies and best practices.

Key Responsibilities

Lead frontend development initiatives and mentor junior developers

Architect and implement scalable frontend solutions

Collaborate with designers and backend developers

Optimize application performance and user experience

Participate in code reviews and technical discussions

Required Skills
Benefits

Competitive salary and equity

Learning & development budget

Latest equipment provided

Free lunch and snacks

Health insurance for you and your family

How to Apply

Interested candidates are invited to apply by sending their CV/Resume to [company email] with
the subject line:

Application for Senior Frontend Developer – [Your Name]

Application Deadline: 8 March, 2025

We look forward to receiving your application!
